comment.body: You may experience some bugs since you switched hubs. Nothing major though

@Dogman: Well. What's done is done. Your old profile should be overwritten with your new one, but your old posts may or may not be deleted. Comments and likes should not be affected, however.

Overall, lots of bugs
Best option right now is delete all hubs. Then goto kaffies hub, and let it sync fully. Make a few posts, then once it seems fixed you can resync the other hubs
